sections.title: Devoted Muse (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Devoted Muse class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Artful Defense (Ex) (Devoted Muse)
sections.description: Adds Charisma modifier per class level as a dodge bonus to AC when wearing light or no armor and not using a shield. Lost when flat-footed or denied Dexterity bonus.

sections.title: Deeds (Ex) (Devoted Muse)
sections.description: Functions as swashbuckler deeds but qualifies as if 3 levels lower (minimum 1), and opportune parry and riposte is delayed until 4th level. Stacks with other deed-granting classes.

sections.title: Panache (Ex) (Devoted Muse)
sections.description: Functions exactly as the swashbuckler panache ability and stacks with levels from other panache-granting classes.

sections.title: Artistic Flourish (Su) (Devoted Muse)
sections.description: When feinting with at least 1 panache point, can create mind-affecting effects instead of denying Dexterity bonus. Effects include distracted, confused, staggered, or dazed with Will saves to resist.

sections.title: Harmonious Strike (Su) (Devoted Muse)
sections.description: When hitting a creature affected by artistic flourish, can spend 1 panache point for special attack effects like circling strike, deadly strike, inspirational strike, or masterful strike.

sections.title: Limitless Art (Ex) (Devoted Muse)
sections.description: Increases starting and maximum panache points by 1 at 4th level, with additional increases at 7th and 10th levels.
